title: Beste Esports-Lol Zitate?
body: Hi Leute kennt ihr inspirirende Lcs-Zitate welche von pro playern zum besten gegeben wurden? Oder vlcht n Link zu einer Seite?

replies.body:
_"You have to understand that in solo queue, anytime you die it's almost exclusively your fault. You can always play better and you can't change your teams. I think it's stupid the way people approach solo queue by just saying 'Oh, my team sucks.' You don't play solo queue to get your team better, you play solo queue to get yourself better. And by getting yourself better you're able to carry your team, raise elo, and then your teammates will get better."_ 
- Doublelift (Gefunden auf Reddit)
